transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Yeah, hi, Kanchan.

Customer: Ji haan boliye bataiye.

Executive: Haan Kanchan ji very good evening main Richa Agrawal baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART Noida head office se. I am very to deal here. Kaise hai aap?

Customer: Ji haan. Main theek hu aap bataiye.

Executive: Haan ji, thank you ma'am. I'm also good. Kanchan ji aapka ye The Guru Consultancy ye catalog kal live hua tha, right ma'am? Kal hi sorry parso live hua tha 4th of November tak.

Customer: Ji haan.

Executive: Right? To so far main dekh rahi hu aapka engagement jaise aapne abhi tak 11 leads consume kiye hai. So as per your feedback ki jo bhi leads aapne consume kiye hai usme se ek bhi lead aapko genuine nahi mili hai.

Customer: Aaj ki jo ek lead thi jisse maine aaj call kari hai. Wo Delhi ki hai Omkar Enterprises. Wo lead sahi nikli hai. Usse to meri baat hui hai. Lekin jo mujhe kal 10 lead di gayi thi, 10 ki 10 lead mujhe pehle wo shortlist karai gayi thi. Ki aapko agar lagta hai aapke layak hai to aap use shortlist kar lijiye jab mera chalu nahi hua tha. Theek hai? To maine unhe shortlist karke rakhi hui thi. Unme se mujhe ek bhi lead kaam ki nahi mili. Sab lead aise thi like basically to unko job chahiye thi. They were the job seeker. And I made the express list. Jinko ki main service provide kar saku.

Executive: Achcha. To kitne percent lead aisi thi ma'am jo job seekers ki lead thi?

Customer: Maine 10 number pe call kiya tha. 10 me se log aise the jinhone kaha ki mujhe hume job chahiye. 6 se bhi jyada hi honge. Matlab keval do log aise the jinhone ye kaha ki humne koi requirement dali hi nahi.

Executive: Achcha. 6 log to aise the jinhone bola ki hume job chahiye. Ye nahi 6 se jyada hi hai kyuki do log keval aise mile the mujhe jinhone ye kaha ki hume koi requirement nahi hai humne aisi koi lead nahi dali. Koi inquiry nahi kari hai. Do mujhe aise mile yani ki jo aath log the wo log keval aur keval job search kar rahe hai.

Executive: Achcha. Par aaj jo aapne lead consume kari Delhi ke jo buyer hai wo aapko genuine laga.

Customer: To ma'am kuch aapka deal hua unke sath ma'am finalize hua?

Executive: Abhi maine unko apna proposal bheja hua hai. They will read and after that they will tell me. To wo unke sath me coordination hai. Main suppose karti chaliye unhone bhi nahi respond kiya. But at least that was a genuine lead.

Customer: Haan genuine. Wo abhi requirement nahi hai ho sakta hai future aapke customer ban jaye wo.

Executive: Bilkul. Abhi unko nahi requirement lage but mujhe ye to hai na ki chalo ek company hi thi jisko ki.

Customer: Bilkul. Mujhe aise hi customers chahiye na mere liye. Sirf aise nahi ki jinko job need ho. Right?

Executive: Ya fir aisa kuch jo kehte hai ki maine to call ki hi nahi. Maine koi requirement nahi dali.

Customer: Ji haan.

Executive: Achcha. Theek hai ma'am main samajh gayi aapki baat. Ma'am dekhiye kya hai na aapka ye service industry hai. Isme ma'am matlab thoda bahut aisa aayega lekin agar aap keh rahe ho ki 60-80% aisa aa raha hai to main bilkul isko improve karne ki koshish karti hu. But thoda bahut rahega ma'am ye to aap matlab aise. Main ready hu. Agar mujhe 10 lead me se char bhi lead genuine mil jati na, main khush thi. Mujhe farak nahi padta. Main bhi samajhti hu ki main bhi service deti hu mujhe bhi pata hai 100% genuinity kahin nahi mil payegi.

Customer: Hmm hmm. Agar mujhe char panch lead bhi achi mil jati 10 me se main satisfied hoti. Lekin mujhe 10 ke 10 number negative mile hai.

Executive: Mera impression ye gaya mujhe aisa laga like maine kuch galti kar di hai IndiaMART ko lekar. Nahi nahi ma'am. Aaj ki call ke baad mujhe thoda positive laga. Mujhe aaj ki call achi mili hai mujhe isliye main uske liye positive hu. But fir bhi main apna 10 10 jo meri bekar leads hai main unko bekar nahi jane dungi mujhe apna replacement chahiye.

Customer: Nahi nahi ma'am dekhiye kya hota hai na ki ye jo lead hum aapko dete hai na, weekly, ma'am inka na koi jaise agar matlab aapne use kar li, ma'am dekhiye har ek lead pe to main aapko conversion ki guarantee nahi deti hu ma'am.

Executive: Main nahi keh rahi hu. Agar maine bhi aapko kaha ki agar un 10 lead me se mujhe paanch lead bhi achi mil jati na, main satisfied hoti main aapko un paanch lead ke liye ladti nahi ki nahi ji paanch lead meri kharab kyu gayi hai. Mujhe bhi samajh me aata hai. Lekin mere sath hua kya na mere ko 10 lead batai gayi thi ki aapko pehle din 10 lead di jayengi. Main usme se ye mujhe lagai thi chalo mujhe do teen char kuch lead achi milengi. Mujhe 10 ke 10 bekar mili hai. To main unhe count nahi karne wali.

Customer: Ma'am actually dekhiye aapko aage bhi dekhiye aaj ek lead achi mili lekin ho sakta hai ma'am kal dekhiye har ek lead genuine nahi hogi ma'am. Main samajh gayi hu mujhe mil gayi na mujhe. Lekin ma'am yaha pe na aise na lead reverse karne ka as such hamare paas koi mechanism nahi hai. Ek month to dena padega. Replacement to dena padega. Main aise mere bewajah ke paise nahi hai. Replacement to aapko dena padega un 10 leads ka. Main ye nahi keh rahi ki aap mujhe abhi ke abhi do. One week pada hai na jab se chalu hua hai. Us one week me mujhe apne 17 chahiye. Haan mujhe call aati hai samne wala mujhe ye bol deta hai na ki bhai mujhe nahi mere ko aapki service samajh me nahi aayi. Mujhe mere ko jo candidate chahiye wo mujhe nahi chahiye aapke paas se mujhe samajh me aayega. Lekin mujhe job seeker milega main ye nahi samajh sakti. Maine job seekers ke liye to maine. Thoda sa na service industry me ho jata hai aisa ki job seeker mil jata hai lekin hum isko reduce karenge. Padega dekhiye ab main ye kar sakti hu ki chaliye theek hai aap 10 na dijiye lekin saat ke replacement to mujhe chahiye. Ma'am main ek bhi replacement kaise du aisa usko mechanism hi nahi hai. Kyuki dekhiye ma'am hum aapko 70 leads dete hai weekly. To aapne maine mujhe nahi nahi meri baat suniye. Maine aap se kya cheez mangi thi aur mujhe waisa kuch mila hi nahi. To main us cheez ka paisa kyu du? Nahi nahi ma'am aapko aisa kisne bola ki hum aise aapko reverse kar dete hai lead. Sab. Mujhe reverse chahiye obviously baat hai nahi to mera paisa bekar ka thoda na hai.

Executive: Ma'am dekhiye paisa to kisi ka bhi bekar ka nahi hota. Hum aapko listing de rahe hai 68 leads. Ye to sahi baat hai. Ma'am 68 lead aapko monthly milti hai. Theek hai usme aapko milengi kuch aisi leads. Impression hai wo kya hai na. Sorry ma'am. Main pagal hu main subah se sham tak. Maine first day mere ko call ki main char din se wait kar rahi thi ki kab mera on hoga main call karungi. Main jaise mera on hua hai maine subah 9 baje call start kari hai karne ke liye aur mujhe aisa impression milta hai ki mere ko koi ek single lead sahi nahi mili. Ab aap mujhe 10 ki 10 lead. Meri baat suniye pehle puri. Aap mujhe keh rahe ki haan humne aapko 10 lead di humne is confidence ke sath di ki 10 me se paanch aapko achi niklengi. Mujhe ek bhi achi nahi mili aur uske baad aap mujhse keh rahe ho ki ab main us cheez ko aise hi rakh lu koi farak nahi padta aage to mil hi jayengi. Aage to waise hi milni thi mujhe. Main 10 lead bekar ki kyu leke baithu? Mere one week me se aapne 17 me se 10 lead meri kharab de di jo kaam ki thi hi nahi. Haan Kanchan ji main isme na aapko ek cheez aur add karna chahti hu. Main ye dekh rahi hu jitna bhi in aapne lead consume kari hai na usme se mostly lead aapne na purana lead more than 50% lead to aapne aise hi consume kari hai ki ek din pehle post hua aur aapne usko ek din baad kharida. To ma'am kya hota hai na aap mobile aap app download kar lijiye aap na. Wo wo main aap samajh gayi ki bhai mujhe app download karni hai. Mujhe ye aapke agent ne hi batai gayi thi. Mujhe wo pehle se shortlist karwaya gaya tha. Ki aapko kuch achcha lag raha hai na aap usko shortlist kar lijiye. Abhi ma'am jo aapne haan theek hai. Lekin kya hota hai na ma'am ye immediate requirement hoti hai aapke paas aap mobile app download kar lijiye IndiaMART ka jaise hi notification aata hai aap turant lead consume kariye kyuki competition jyada hai. Lead ki koi kami nahi hai ma'am achi khasi inquiries hai aapke jo aap consultancy service me ho development service me ho usme kafi lead generate hota hai lead ki koi kami nahi hai aur agar aap dekhoge aapki listing to aapki listing bhi IndiaMART pe jo hai top results me hai aap khol ke dekhiye koi bhi apni hot category se to listing bahut badhiya hai aapki and aapke paas ma'am hamare paas lead ki bhi koi kami nahi hai bas aap se ek request hai ki mobile app ke through karo kyuki jaise hi lead aayegi aapke paas notification aayega notification aayega turant lead consume karke buyer ko contact karoge to yaha pe chances of conversion bahut jyada high hote hai ma'am. Abhi kya hai more than 50% lead aap purana kharite ho to kya hota hai na buyer bol deta hai meri to koi requirement nahi hai kyuki usko kahin aur se mil mil gaya hota hai ma'am. Hai na ma'am aur ya fir wo apna statement change kar deta hai ye nahi chahiye wo nahi chahiye aap use karo ma'am aapke parso aapko service. Main keh rahi hu usi cheez ke liye maine kaha na ki chaliye theek hai wo lead mujhe aise mili. Theek hai mere ko do bando ne aise bola ki mujhe nahi mere ko koi maine to koi inquiry nahi dali. Theek hai mujhe is cheez ka satisfaction chala wo company to thi at least. Mujhe is cheez ka satisfaction hai. Ab rahi baat maine old data pe kiya wo aapke agent ne bataya. Mujhe jaisa jaisa kaha gaya maine waisa waisa kiya hai. Maine ek bhi cheez apne man se nahi kari main har cheez pooch ke karti hu. Ki mujhe karna chahiye ki nahi karna chahiye. Jo unhone mujhe samjhaya maine wo kiya hai. Main unhone aapko kya samjhaya sir? Ma'am sorry. Unhone dekhiye unhone mujhe shortlist karwaya tha. Jin pe maine call kari na wo maine pehle shortlist ki thi teen char din tak ye cheez chalta raha ki aaj abhi website banegi abhi catalog banega abhi wo live hoga ye hoga wo hoga karke teen din lagbhag gaye the us cheez me. Us cheez me jaise wo mujhe jab live karte the ya fir wo dikhate the mujhe as per demo to mujhe batate the ki madam ye ek wo aayi hui hai inquiry hai aap isko agar aapko samajh me aaye to aap isko shortlist karke rakhiye. Aap isko call kar sakte hai baad me. Mujhe bataya gaya na. Tabhi to maine kiya. Nahi to mujhe apne aap se to nahi aayega na IndiaMART maine to pehle use nahi kiya hoga. Nahi theek hai agar unhone bola aapne kar liya main to aage aapko advice hi de rahi hu kyuki ma'am aap kyuki hum dekhiye ma'am main aapke ye reverse nahi hota hai hamare yaha pe as such koi mechanism hai hi nahi ki hum reverse kar de. To dekho ma'am replacement to karni padegi. Main 10 ke 10 waste nahi kara sakti. Main 10 me se saat to mujhe replacement chahiye. Aap logo ne mujhe kaha tha one week me first week aapko 10 10 aap mujhe calls denge mujhe 10 calls aap logo ki taraf se nahi di gayi hai. Wo maine khud se jo shortlist kar rakhi thi maine unko call kar liya. Aur unme se ek bhi kaam ka nahi hai agar aapko chahiye main sabki recording bhej sakti hu. Mera number har waqt recording pe rehta hai. Ma'am main ek kaam karti hu. Aap meri baat suniye wo kya mang rahe hai. Mang rahi thi. Ma'am dekhiye as per main aapki baat un kara deti hu jinhone aapko sale kiya tha. Wo aapko bata denge ki ki 10 leads kaise chalta hai matlab hum IndiaMART kaise kaam karta hai shayad aapke expectations bahut high hai ma'am kyuki main ye aapko ye process hi nahi hai ki main aapko ye reverse kar paau lead. Hai na? Kal fir aap mere ko bolenge ki dusre week me bhi aisi aayi madam aap 10 kar dijiye reverse. Nahi nahi nahi nahi main kal ki kyu kahungi main kal ka kyu kahungi? Mere ko chahte to mujhe agle hafte fir bolenge ki ye bhi lead kharab thi isme se 10 aisi aayi to fir aap. Agar mujhe nahi nahi nahi meri baat suniye agar mujhe maine aapko clear cut bata rakha hai mujhe industrial data chahiye. Theek hai? Mujhe industrial data chahiye mujhe companies ka data chahiye. Company mujhe mana kar de mujhe nahi mujhe koi requirement nahi hai mujhe samajh me aayega. Aap mujhe B to B ki baat keh kar aap mujhe B to C de rahe ho mujhe individuals de rahe ho. Main usko kyu accept karungi bhai? Aaj ka main nahi karungi. Kanchan ji theek hai maine ek baar aapki unse baat kara deti hu aap unse understand kar lo fir hum decide kar lenge ki aage kaise karna hai. Bata diya unko samjha diya unhone hi mujhe ye cheez boli hai. Nahi main aapki ek baar baat kara sakti main unki ek baar aap se baat kara deti hu unhone aapko sale karte time kya bola aap unhe baat bata dijiye ye Saurav naam hai Deepak Singh Negi Shivam kisne sale kiya tha aapko? Deepak ji hai aur ek Rakesh ji hai. Rakesh ji Rohit ji Deepak Shivam Rakesh. Rakesh naam hai mere paas ek. Unse meri baat hui unka number bhi mere paas save hai. Deepak Kumar Deepak Singh Negi bhi hai na? Negi ji Deepak Negi ji se baat ho rahi hai meri aur Rakesh ji se baat ho rahi hai. Theek hai hum inko bolte hai ek baar aap se baat kar le fir hum ek baar decide kar lenge ki kya karna hai ma'am. Hmm theek hai ji. Theek hai ma'am theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received job seeker leads.

- Wants replacement for 10 useless leads.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with lead quality.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect customer with sales representative.

- Explained about mobile app for immediate lead consumption.

- Explained that lead reversal is not possible.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call with sales representative.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, replacement, job seekers
